Articles.Content:
It's certainly been a while since I abandoned this place, but I've started getting back into KSP and with all this new chatter about a sequel I felt it was high time to get back in the game... well, forum.

As a 17 year old with many adjustments having transpired in my mind, I feel that my behavior / maturity and ability to dedicate myself to KSP's community has dramatically improved, as has my abilities in all areas, including playing the game. I am pleased to announce that 2 days ago I landed on Eeloo and returned safely for the first time!

It's good to be back!

Welcome back, @Souper!

Glad you decided to pick the game back up, looks like it's a good time for it.

 

I'm gonna move this over to our Welcome Aboard section for ya.
Wow sorry for the delay, but I am very new here (and I did see you were from here a long time ago too!) Welcome back to the forum @Souper The best game ever!

Welcome back @Souper.

You should hopefully find that the community has not changed at all in your absence, with everyone staying nice and friendly.
